fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Youth, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Transport, Borders and Security, Migration and asylum, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives:
Política Regional y de Cohesión 
Cooperación Territorial Europea 
Cooperación Transfronteriza dentro de la UE, en sus fronteras externas, en los países de la Adhesión y la Buena Vecindad y en países terceros.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
belgium_office_address: Oficina de Extremadura en Bruselas Av. de Cortenbergh 87-89
subsection: Transnational associations and networks of public regional or other sub-national authorities
membership:
FOGAR (Forum of Global Associations of Regions) 
http://www.regionsunies-fogar.org/images/Documentos/46_declaration_marseille_en.pdf 
AEBR Vicepresident François Maitia (Aquitaine) signed this Declaration of Marseille, Founding Document of FOGAR
goals__remit:
Representar los intereses de las regiones fronterizas y transfronterizas europeas ante las instituciones europeas, gobiernos nacionales y otras instancias. 
Identificar sus problemas, oportunidades, tareas y proyectos en particular. 
Iniciar, apoyar y coordinar su cooperación en toda Europa. 
Intercambiar experiencias e información para formular y coordinar intereses communes a partir de distintos problemas y oportunidades de las regiones fronterizas, y ofrecer soluciones. 
Promover estructuras, proyectos y programas de Cooperación Transfronteriza (CTF). 
Ayudar en la preparación de eventos de CTF y otras actividades.
relevant_communication:
Last General Assembly and Annual Conference in Badajoz (Extremadura, Spain) with side events in Cáceres and Mérida on Cross-Border Cooperation in Latin Americ, CB School and How to Overcome CB Legal and Administrative Obstacles withinin the EU, 23-28 October 2017.  
Next General Assembly and Annual Conference, plus II CB School and a Workshop on the ESPON Project on CB Public Services in Oulu (Bothnian Arc, Finland) from 19 to 22 September 2018 
Main projects currently implemented: IVY (Interreg Volunteer Youth), March 2017 - December 2019; B-Solutions (identifying CB legal and administrative obstacles and testing posible solutions); several in the Balkans with young people; various with sub-national authorities in Latin American cross-border areas, namely Ecuador-Colombia, Perú-Ecuador, Bolivia-Perú, Colombia-Perú-Brazil and the borders of Mexico with Guatemala and with the US; exploration activities in Jerusalem.
